author: lveldere
body:
**under construction, pull request was opened to ease discussion**

A new producer, TrackFromSeedProducer, 
takes as input a TrajectorySeedCollection.
From each seed are produced:
- a Track,
- a TrackExtra
- a TrackingRecHitCollection
  where only the seed's hits are considered.
  The implementation of TrackFromSeedProducer is copy pasted from TrackerSeedValidator
  http://cmslxr.fnal.gov/lxr/source/Validation/RecoTrack/plugins/TrackerSeedValidator.cc?v=CMSSW_7_4_0#0236 (line 236)

To validate a TrajectorySeedCollection,
the collection is given to the TrackFromSeedProducer.
The resulting track collection is passed to the MultiTrackValidator.

Sequences are provided in 
- FastSim: Validation/RecoTrack/python/TrajectorySeedValidation_fastsim_cff.py
- FullSim: Validation/RecoTrack/python/TrajectorySeedValidation_cff.py

To test with FastSim

```
cmsDriver.py TTbar_13TeV_TuneCUETP8M1_cfi  --conditions auto:run2_mc --fast  -n 10 --eventcontent FEVTDEBUGHLT,DQM --relval 100000,1000 -s GEN,SIM,RECOBEFMIX,DIGI:pdigi_valid,L1,L1Reco,RECO,VALIDATION:tr\
acksAndTrajectorySeedsValidationStandalone --datatier GEN-SIM-DIGI-RECO,DQMIO --beamspot NominalCollision2015 --customise SLHCUpgradeSimulations/Configuration/postLS1Customs.customisePostLS1 --magField 3\
8T_PostLS1 --python_filename fastsim.py
```

To test with FullSim

```
cmsDriver.py step3  --customise SLHCUpgradeSimulations/Configuration/postLS1Customs.customisePostLS1 --conditions auto:run2_mc -s RAW2DIGI,RECO,VALIDATION:tracksAndTrajectorySeedsValidationS\
tandalone --datatier GEN-SIM-RECO,DQMIO -n 10 --magField 38T_PostLS1 --eventcontent RECOSIM,DQM --filein das:/RelValTTbar_13/CMSSW_7_5_0_pre4-MCRUN2_75_V1-v1/GEN-SIM-DIGI-RAW-HLTDEBUG
```
